content:
On the border with Slovakia, an interesting character was exposed, who tried to go abroad with counterfeit documents. During the control, the evasion, together with the passport of the citizen of Ukraine, provided three birth certificates of children who seem to be citizens of Tajikistan.

About thisinformsSPSU.

The man reported that he was a Tajik by nationality, and in 2022 he moved to Kiev, where he married Ukrainian and received Ukrainian citizenship.

In Tajikistan, he said, he has two more wives with whom he is married and from whom he has three children.

“However, when checking the documents of a multifaceted man, the border guards found signs of forgery in the birth certificates of the birth of his children. In particular, the inspectors found that the original data in all three documents was piled with a chemical, and a new text was applied on top, ”the STSU was stated.

After that, the National Police were summoned to the place, who initiated criminal proceedings under Article 358 (forgery).

As reportedArmyinform, in Transcarpathia, border guards saved budget evasion.
title: Three wives, three children and fictitious documents: a cunning evader was exposed in Transcarpathia
description: About it reports the SPSU. The man reported that by nationality he is Tajik, and in 2022 ...
author: Army Inform
